attributes.action: Listen to the people or remove this petition feature from the parliament website
attributes.additional_details:
Second EU referendum petition - over 4 million signatures, and nothing done.

Allow GCSE Students to have a formula sheet in their tests petition - around 100k signatures, and an inappropriate response.

Authorise open book examinations for GCSE English Literature 2017 petition - around 100k signatures, and an inappropriate response.

+ many more!!
attributes.background: I think this petition page should be removed. Even when multiple people have signed petitions, the government don't change any regulations nor do they give appropriate responses. No point in having something like this when it is a ploy to supposedly show that they do listen - when they don't.
